gambitrmp
and worst-case scenario, he'll do some mystics damage. Seems decent enough to me too. If Goop wants to review EVERY piece, he's going to over-look things IMO. I don't put much stock in his reviews. They often seem rushed to me. Plus pretty clearly biased for a highly competitive format. If that's you thing, great. Ignore 90% of every set them & just look for the top 10%. That's not how I look at the game at all. Edit - Running the Spooktacular team together looks like a lot of fun to me. Mystics & shape change all around on fairly cheap pieces with stop clix. Heck, I think they stand a chance.
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Oh, I'll play this guy all day. Yes, TK, want that, but even if not, he's got Flying and Stealth. Your opponent puts a figure with reducers next to a single square of Hindering? Boom, there's a Vision there now. In Sealed he's looking for--yes, the Telekinesis, mentioned that--but also a great Taxi for the common Winter Soldier, or Monica Rambeau, or a taxi-ee for the common T'Challa Star-Lord. Very versatile, and as with all the ANHS-trait pieces, that 5 points under the crucial 50-point benchmark lets me feel like I've got the breathing room to get risky. As a friend of mine used to say, "he's got Shape Change, he'll be fine."
May 3, 2022
Goop
The lack of any type of move and attack hurts this figure a lot. If you can tk him in or have other ways to move him around he would be alright but by himself with 0 range its going to be tough to get attacks in.
